sentence: Republican Pennsylvania Congressman Brian Fitzpatrick and Florida Representative Matt Gaetz joined the Democrats signing the bill.

title: Bipartisan Group Of Lawmakers Demand Pelosi Hold Vote On Stock Trading Bans

sentence: The GOP sponsors, meanwhile, were centrist Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick of Pennsylvania and Rep. Matt Gaetz of Florida, a staunch conservative and ally of former President Donald Trump.

title: Bipartisan group pressures Pelosi for movement on lawmaker stock deals

sentence: Members should live by the rules every American lives by, not remove us from the economy.” Two Republicans — Matt Gaetz of Florida and Brian Fitzpatrick of Pennsylvania — were among the letter’s 27 signatories.

title: House lawmakers call on Pelosi, McCarthy to pass stock trade ban

sentence: The Republicans on the bipartisan House legislation are Reps. Tony Gonzales of Texas, August Pfluger of Texas, Brian Fitzpatrick of Pennsylvania, Don Bacon of Nebraska and Maria Elvira Salazar of Florida.

title: Dem Rep. Cuellar joins bipartisan effort to block Biden's rollback of Title 42, opposes bussing migrants to DC
